article: president mahmoud ahmadinejad of iran suggested tuesday that pope benedict xvi had satisfactorily `` modified '' his remarks on islam , one sign of an apparent easing of anger since the pope issued an apology on sunday for having caused offense with a speech he delivered last week .
abstract: iranian leader accepts pope 's recast of his remarks
